dialog: Today, you join the ranks of the Jungvolk in a very special training weekend.
But today, you become a man.
I swear to devote all my energies and my strength to the savior of our country, Adolf Hitler.
I am willing and ready to give up my life for him.
Now, Jojo Betzler, what is your mind?
And, Jojo Betzler, what is your body?
Jojo Betzler, what is your courage?
And, Jojo Betzler, what is your soul?
I don't think I can do this.
Sure, you're a little bit scrawny and a bit unpopular and you can't tie your shoelaces even though you're ten years old But you're still the bestest, most loyal little Nazi I've ever met.
Not to mention the fact you're really goodlooking.
So, you're gonna get out there and you're gonna have a great time, okay?
What? You can heil me better than that.
Heil "Hitterler." Who's "Hitterler?" Do you even speak German?
Have a great day! You're gonna be the best.
Heil Hitler! You can do it.
âª Oh, komm doch, komm zu mir âª  Heil Hitler.
âª Du nimmst mir der Verstand âª  Heil Hitler. Heil Hitler.

âª Oh, komm doch, komm zu mir âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Oh, du bist so schÃ¶n âª âª SchÃ¶n wie ein Diamant âª Heil Hitler. Heil Hitler.
âª Ich will mit dir gehen âª  Heil Hitler. Heil Hitler.
âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª  Heil Hitler, Yorki.
Are you ready for the best weekend ever?

âª Das war noch nie bei einer Anderen âª  âª Einmal so, Einmal so âª âª Einmal so âª âª Oh, du bist so schÃ¶n âª âª SchÃ¶n wie ein Diamant âª âª Ich will mit dir gehen âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª âª Komm, gib mir deine Hand âª Heil! Heil! Heil!
Jungvolk, welcome to the Hitlerjugend training weekend.
In which we will make men and women of you all.
You may call me Captain K.
Ja. And this is SubOfficer Finkel.
And why am I here talking to a bunch of little tittygrabbers instead of leading my men into battle towards glorious death? Great question.
I've asked it myself every day since Operation Screw Up where I lost a perfectly good eye in a totally preventable enemy attack.
And according to my superiors, you need two eyes to be a meaningful part of the war effort.
Over the next two days, you little critters will get to experience some of the things that the mighty German army goes through every day.
And even though it would appear our country's on the back foot and there really isn't much hope in us winning this war, apparently we're doing just fine.
Anyway. You boys have all been issued with your Deutsches Jungvolk daggers.
These are very special and expensive weapons.
You should never be without them.
And don't try to stab each other.
This is your first step towards being men.

Today you boys will be involved in such activities as marching, bayonet drills, grenadethrowing, trenchdigging, mapreading, gas defense, camouflage, ambush techniques, war games, firing guns, and blowing stuff up.
The girls will practice important womanly duties such as dressing wounds, making beds, and learning how to get pregnant.
Such a great year to be a girl.
All right. Let's get to it.
âª Well, when I'm lyin' in my bed at night âª Go, go, go!
âª Nothin' ever seems to turn out right âª âª I don't want to grow up âª Three, two, one, swastika!
âª How do you move in a world of fog âª Come on!
âª Makes me wish that I could be a dog âª Aaah! Aaah!
âª Well, when I see the price that you pay âª âª I don't ever want to be that way âª âª I don't want to grow up âª  Now finish him.
âª The only thing to live for is today âª  Fangs.
Because, once upon a time, a Jewish man mated with a fish.
We, Aryans, are one thousand times more civilized and advanced than any other race.
Now, get your things together, kids.
It's time to burn some books.

âª Comb their hair and shine their shoes âª âª I don't want to grow up âª âª Stay around my old hometown âª âª I don't want to put no money down âª âª I don't want to get me a big old loan âª âª Work them fingers to the bone âª âª I don't want to float a broom âª âª Fall in love and get married, then boom âª âª How the hell did it get here so soon? âª âª I don't want to grow up âª Jews sound scary, huh?
If I met one, I'd kill it like that.
But how would you know if you saw one?
They could look just like us.
I'd feel its head for horns.
And they smell like brussels sprouts.
Oh, yeah. I forgot about the brussels sprouts bit.
Imagine catching one and giving it to Hitler.
That'd be a surefire way to get into his personal guards.
Then we would become best friends.
I thought I was your best friend.
First place is reserved for the FÃ¼hrer.
So, unless you're Hitler hiding in a fat, little boy's body...
I'd be happy with second place.
I guess I'm just a kid in a fat kid's body.
When you stand before the enemy and have to end his life, which of you will have the stomach to do this?
There is no room in Hitler's army for those that lack strength.
Those that are prepared to kill at will.
Wring its neck and kill the rabbit.
I'm not scared. I... I just...
Place both hands around its neck and then one hard twist.
He might scream, but we'll just use the boot to finish it off.
But no one has heard from him in two years.
He's scared and so are you.
You're as scared as a little rabbit.
Maybe we should snap your neck, too?
Wanna tell me about that rabbit incident?
They wanted me to kill it.
But now they call me a scared rabbit.
Let them say whatever they want.
People used to say a lot of nasty things about me.
"Oh, this guy's a lunatic." "Oh, look at that psycho.
He's gonna get us all killed." I'm gonna let you in on a little secret.
The humble little bunny faces a dangerous world every day, hunting carrots for his family, for his country.
My empire will be full of all animals.
Lions, giraffes, zebras, rhinoceroses, octopuses, rhinoctopuses.
Oh, no, thanks. I don't smoke.
Let me give you some really good advice.
The humble bunny can outwit all of his enemies.
He's brave and sneaky and strong.
Oh, I thought you were crying.
Now, it's time for Jojo to show those stick insects who is the real cowardly rabbit.
I'm sorry, what are you talking about?
Now, lads, each of you will be given the opportunity to ignite and throw a grenade.
I will personally be supervising each of you to make sure you don't blow your eyes out or something.
He looks like a Picasso painting.
His mother's going to kill me.
Mm, mm, mm, mm, mm, mm, mm.
Your son is ugly like a monster.
Besides, your scars will heal, and you'll get most of the movement back in your leg.
But I'll never be in Hitler's personal guards.
Ah, you're fine as you are.
I'm just happy to have you back home. Hmm?
Mama Lion worries about her cub, especially when Papa Lion isn't here.
You grab the rabbit by the tail, wrap it around his ear, tie it all up and then stuff him back down the hole.
Now then, let's get on our way, huh?
I think getting out of the house will do wonders for your recuperation.
I don't want to go out there.
Not everyone's lucky enough to look stupid.
I, for one, am cursed to look incredibly attractive.
Now, you're going to pluck up your courage, walk out that door and have an incredible adventure.
Field Marshal Jojo, you're our top man.
Frau Betzler, you're looking fetching as usual.
It's because of you my son can't walk properly and has a messedup face.
So, you are going to look after him while I'm at work, hmm?
Make sure he has a job and feels included. Got it?
Got it. Ja, I really got it.
The kid I told you about.
Remember, he stole a hand grenade and blew himself up and as a result I got demoted for negligence.
Now I get to work in this office with all these wonderful kids.
I'm sure we can figure out something for you to do.
Okay, well, we need somebody to walk the clones.
Also, I think maybe he could hand out this new propaganda, and deliver these conscriptions.
I don't suppose I could be conscripted?
Oh, yes, that's a wonderful idea.
Yes, I give my full permission for you to send this tenyearold child into war.
Will someone get this kid a gun?
And I'd be more than happy to fight in the front.
Okay. Here are the conscriptions, and here is a gun.
It's a bit... for the gun?
I'm far too hungry and you know how much we love the taste of blood.
I'm something worse, but I think you already know that, don't you?
Well, your mother invited me, so I suppose that makes me her guest.
What will you do, sweet Hitlerchen?
But do you know what happens if you do?
I'll tell them you helped me.
And if you tell her you know about me, just one word...
I'll do the world a great, big favor and cut your Nazi head off.
I think I'll hold onto this.
What am I going to do?
I mean, there could be more of them.
Hundreds of them living in your walls.
How did she get control like that?
Did you see how fast she moved?
Like a little, female Jewish Jesse Owens.
And now she's got your fancy knife.
Yeah. Like a little, female Jewish Jesse Owens, Jack the Ripper.
You're definitely in a pickle, my friend.
Ah, what to do, what to do?
Burn down the house and blame Winston Churchill.
Um... Jew girl in the wall?
Okay, well, I'll just say what I have to say and that's this: I'm not scared of you and I think you should find somewhere else to live.
Get the hell out of my room.
And now she's got two knives.
How are you going to chop up stuff?
Oh, and she's still up there, too.
What are we gonna do about that Jew?
Stop offering me damned cigarettes! I'm ten!
You can't tell your mother or that Jew will cut off your Nazi head, but there's no reason this thing in the attic needs to ruin your life.
In fact, you could use it to your advantage.
When someone tries to use mind powers on me, know what I do?
Use mind powers back on them.
Remember last year when that onearm pirate von Stauffenberg tried to blow me up with a table bomb?
The only reason I survived, apart from having bombproof legs, is because I outwitted old von Stauffy.
I let him think that I was dead, when in actual fact, I was absolutely fine.
By pretending I was dead, I drew out all the traitors.
So what are you going to do?
No, what I mean is this: make her feel safe and then she'll drop her guard and then you will be the one in control.
Just use my backwards mind power trick, and everything will be fine.
We're having unicorn for dinner at my place tonight.
Remember, a Jew living in your wall is better than two Jews flying around with their bat wings climbing down chimneys and eating innocent Nazis.
And don't give her any more knives.
Darling cub, why are you up, huh?
Sorry, I lost track of time.
I was taking a long walk and having a thing...
What are we going to do with these laces, huh?
You'll learn how to tie them eventually, no?
Oh. That's so sad for you.
It's sadder for me, though, because I have to live with a crazy person.
You know what I heard? Rats.
I've been meaning to tell you to stay away from upstairs, until I've cleared them all, okay?
I don't need you getting sick.
I'll watch out for those dirty rats.
Where are all the goddamn knives?
Are you going to bed, too?
I have to tidy some things first.
Boy, you have to trust me, okay?
You have to be more quiet.
If I have to choose between you and my son, I...
I won't know where to send you.
If he knows, then they know.
It took him three weeks to get over the fact that his grandfather was not blond.
I know he's in there somewhere.
The little boy who loves to play and runs to you because he's scared of thunder.
In the end, that's all you have.
that your only remaining child is not just another ghost.
You've lived more lifetimes than most.
They say you can't live, that you won't live.
If that comes true, then they win.
As long as there's someone alive, somewhere, then they lose.
They didn't get you yesterday or today.
Soon your leg will only be a little bit deformed and pointless.
I'm going to recommend another month off school though because your face might scare the other kids.
I'll see you at home. Mmm.
If it isn't Herr Hand Grenade himself.
I'm being made to teach the HJ boys water warfare training.
You know, in case they ever need to go to battle in a swimming pool.
Can I ask you a question about Jews?
What should I do if I see one?
If you see a Jew, you tell us, we tell the Gestapo, and they tell the SS, and then they go and they kill the Jew.
And anyone who helped the Jew.
And because these are very paranoid times, probably some other people just in case.
It's a pretty drawn out process.
Even if the Jew hypnotized someone to make them hide the Jew in the first place?
I'd be amazed if that could happen.
A Jew hypnotized him and he became a massive drunk and a gambler.
And he cheated on his wife and he had an inappropriate relationship with my sister.
And then he drowned in an unrelated accident, but it was the Jew's fault.
I'm not sure I'd be able to tell if I did.
Without their funny hats, it's damn near impossible.
Someone should write a book on the subject.
It would make things so much easier.
I'll see you later, little man.
If I tell on you, you'll be in big trouble, and I don't think you want that.
But then you'll tell on me and my mother, and we'll be in trouble, which I don't want.
And if you tell my mother I know, then she'll kick you out, which you don't want.
And if I tell my mother I know, then you'll cut off my Nazi head, which I also don't want.
I have some conditions for allowing you to stay here.
Tell me everything about the Jewish race.
Think of this as an exposÃ©.
I want to know all your secrets.
Kindly refrain from sitting on my sister's bed.
You know nothing of my sister.
Start telling me about your kind.
Obviously, we are demons who love money.
But what people don't know is that we're also allergic to food.
That stuff will kill us instantly.
So, if you're thinking of ending my life, that's the fastest way.
Anyway, there's not enough food for you, so I don't know what you're going to do.
Your mother managed to find me some bread.
She treats me like a person.
You are weak like an eyelash.
I am born of Aryan ancestry.
My blood is the color of a pure red rose.
And my eyes are blue like...
I am descended from those who wrestle angels and kill giants.
You were chosen by a pathetic little man who can't even grow a full mustache.
So, how's it all going with that Jew thing upstairs?
Well, she doesn't want to talk to me.
Mmhmm. Well, you are a Nazi.
This book is going to be harder to write than I thought.
France will be next and soon the war will be over.
Why does that make you happy?
You hate your country that much?
It's pointless and stupid, and the sooner we have peace, the better.
We will crush our enemies into dust.
And when they are destroyed, we shall use their graves as toilets.
No. I am not that hungry.
For now, I am just going to chew on these grapes.
So maybe I'll just finish yours.
Don't want it to go to waste.
Oh, you know, just wandered around, being a deformed kid with nothing to live for.
My face looks like a goddamn street map, woman.
I wouldn't expect you to understand.
If my father were here, he'd get it.
I know. And instead, I'm stuck with you.
Don't you ever talk to your goddamn mother like that!
What kind of apology was that?
I know you miss me, but I'm...
I'm out there trying to make a difference in the world.
And while I'm gone, I need you to take care of my Rosie.
We made a good kid, huh?
It reminds me of dancing with Rosie in The Red Salon.
Hey, don't just sit there, kid.
So, I'd like you to draw a picture of where Jews live.
Where you all eat, sleep, and where the queen Jew lays the eggs.
Come on. We have a lot of work to do.
I'll tell you about the Jews, but you are not privileged to know about my family.
Why are you hanging around with me?
He proposed to me on the banks of the FluÃ.
He knelt down like a proper gentleman, recited a poem by Rilke.
And when I said yes, we danced into the night.
He's coming to rescue me, then we'll go live in Paris.
You'd turn your back on Germany forever?
You and your stupid boyfriend can shut up and go live in damn cheese, snail, baguette land.
Now, now, just because you don't have a girlfriend.
I'm way too busy for a girlfriend.
You'll meet someone and spend your days dreaming of the moment you can hold them in your arms again.
I said to draw where Jews live.
This is just a stupid picture of my head.
We'll use all of these books to make a fake floor that she'll fall through.
Straight into a pit full of piranhas and... and lava and bacon.
Why, she won't know what hit her.
Let's get a book and let's go.
Yeah, this is a really good idea, what we're doing right now.
If she had a heart, this would break it clean in two.
I have something to tell you.
I came across an old letter from Nathan, your fiancÃ©, addressed to you.
What the hell are you talking about?
"Dear Elsa, this is hard for me to say, "but I don't want to marry you anymore.
"I found a new woman and we laugh a lot "and do the tonguekiss.
"It's like my favorite poet, Rilke, says, "'We need in love to practice only this: letting each other go.' "So, goodbye and sorry about letting you go.
"PS, I'm not really in the resistance.
I'm unemployed and quite fat now." Um... don't open the door, but I actually forgot there was a second letter.
"I just wanted to let you know that I don't want to break up with you now.
"I changed my mind because I don't want you to kill yourself over me, "which a couple of girls have done in the past, "and it's pretty stressful.
"Thank God you're being taken care of by that kid "who I must say is a remarkable young man beyond his years.
"And let's still get married sometime, "even though I am truly unemployed "and have nothing going on for me.
Musicians, is that all you have?
Just ask Pissarro, Modigliani, Man Ray, Gertrude Stein, Mr. Moses and the king of them all, Jesus Christi. Amen.
Well, you're just saying any old name now.
I've never heard of these people and now I'm fed up.
If you find any more of those letters, will you let me know?
Ah, these banks used to be full of lovers.
Oh. There's always time for romance.
Why does everyone keep telling me that?
Love is the strongest thing in the world.
I think you'll find that metal is the strongest thing in the world.
Followed closely by dynamite, and then muscles.
Besides, I wouldn't even know it if I saw it.
Like, like, you're full of butterflies.
You know what? Why don't I just leave you here, okay?
I'll come and get you tomorrow.
I'll meet you back at the house.
Tenyearolds shouldn't be celebrating war and talking politics.
You should be climbing trees and then falling out of those trees.
But the FÃ¼hrer says when we win it is us, young boys who will rule the world.
We're going to lose the war and then what are you going to do, hmm?
We have to dance to show God we are grateful to be alive.
Dancing is for people who don't have a job.
Dancing is for people who are free.
It's an escape from all this.
Well, you're free to dance your way home.
Now, go home and kiss your mothers!
No news from Nathan today, I'm afraid.
He's probably doing something amazing, like reading a book or growing a beard.
You want me to tell you about the Jews?
In the beginning, we used to live in caves.
Deep, deep in the center of the Earth.
Scary places full of strange and wonderful creatures all with one thing in common.
Mmhmm. Stealing the ends of penises?
Do you want the story or not?
You may continue, but I know it's true.
After many years of developing magic and spells, we slowly moved out of the caves and into the towns.
Some of us stayed in the caves, though, in animal bodies.
Well, I'll draw them for you.
These days we live among normal people, but often we take over a house and hang from the ceiling when we sleep.
Oh, and another thing is we can read each other's minds.
Their heads are too thick for us to penetrate.
Like birds, our true language sounds like singing.
And we're also attracted to shiny things.
"Attracted to shiny things." But also ugly things.
That's another thing we learned at school.
You two seem to be getting on well.
I was just making sure she was still alive.
I just don't want a dead person in my house.
More dead people in my house, please.
Look, just all the time you two are spending together, it's making me feel very uncomfortable.
You suggested it in the first place.
It shouldn't be weird between us.
None of this should be weird.
Ja, I was just keeping your bed warm for you.
Hey, what do think about this uniform?
I'm not sure about the hips on the pants.
Can I give you some really good advice?
When you see what's in her mind and where she's trying to make you go in your mind, in your mind, you must go the other way.
Do not let her put you in a brain prison.
That, dear Jojo, is one thing that cannot and must not ever, ever happen to a German!
Do not let your German brain be bossed around!
I won't let her boss my German brain around, mein FÃ¼hrer.
Now, I think you've got a lot of good information in your book.
It's time to show it to the world, don't you think?
He thinks Inge's ghost lives up here.
I would love to have seen her grow into a woman.
But I'll have to watch you instead.
I don't know anything about being a woman.
You do things like drink wine?
Learn how to fire a gun.
You look a tiger in the eye.
That's what it is to be a woman.
How do you know you can trust someone?
You know, go to Morocco and the rest?
I never looked a tiger in the eye.
Finkel, I meant we'd need dogs for when the city is attacked, not actual German shepherds.
I'm sorry for yelling at you.
It's a silly name for a dog.
How can we help you today, Master Betzler?
If someone turned in a Jew, would they get a medal or something?
You're still going on about those people?
You know I'm preparing the city for imminent invasion, right?
I'm trying to plan a defense strategy.
I've got Americans to the west, got Russians to the east.
My friend once met some Russians and they ate him.
What do you want to talk about?
Well, I am learning a lot about Jews.
Did you know Jews can read each other's minds?
And when they sleep, they hang from the ceiling, like bats.
And where did you come by this information?
You could also call it Who Are You, Jew?
Oh, you do have a wonderful imagination on you.
When I was your age, I had an imaginary friend called Conny.
He used to wet my bed when I was asleep.
He got me in so much trouble.
You might like to check out what I'm working on.
As part of our preparations for the invasion, I'm redesigning my uniform.
Note, the feathers for aerodynamics, the sparkly color to dazzle the enemy, the boots purely decorative.
And this, this is a Gatling gun mounted with a radio which emits annoying music to dishearten the enemy.
This is all copyrighted, by the way.
That means you can't copy it.
Ja. Don't get any ideas, kid.
The kids tell me that your father's away fighting.
So it appears you are now the man of the house.
So, what jobs do you have for me today?
Well, I've got one, I won't lie.
It's a bit of a step down from what you're used to, but we need all hands on deck right now.
Pots and pans for the war effort!
âª Here comes the metal man âª âª Looking for your pots and pans âª  Metal for Hitler!
That's what I thought at first, too, but it's "paperlike." It's the latest material invented by our top scientists.
I caught a Jew. A real one.
I saw some that they caught hiding in the forest last month.
Personally, I didn't see what all the fuss was about.
They weren't at all scary and seemed kind of normal.
It's so hard to run in this thing.
Maybe you can draw something for my book.
No one wants to see pictures of cripples.
Besides, true artists don't see that stuff.
I'll just accept I'll be one of those guys who'll never get to kiss a girl.
Do you want me to kiss you?
Thing number one: It's illegal for Nazis and Jews to hang out like we do, let alone kiss.
Thing number two: It'd just be a sympathy kiss, which doesn't count.
Uh, I'm massively into swastikas, so I think that's a pretty good sign right there.
You're a tenyearold kid who likes swastikas and likes dressing up in a funny uniform and wants to be part of a club.
But you are not one of them.
"Not a Nazi." What a dirty Jew.
I'm Captain Herman Deertz of the Falkenheim Gestapo.
With me, Herr Mueller, Herr Junker, Herr Klum and Herr Frosch.
My bicycle got a flat tire, so I carried it.
No, no. We were just " Heil Hitlering" the boy and then " Heil Hitlering" yourself and then, of course, " Heil Hitlering" Freddy Finkel and now we are in the midst of a routine inspection.
And, uh, what brings you here, Captain?
Oh, we were just passing by and we thought we'd drop off some pamphlets for the boy.
Oh, you know how it is.
Every day we take a call.
I believe there's a Communist hiding behind my fridge." We go around to investigate.
It's all part of the job.
Now this is my kind of little boy's bedroom.
You and your friends may have heard a rumor that Hitler only has one ball.
So, you are volunteering at the Hitlerjugend office, yes?
I wish more of our young boys had your blind fanaticism.
What on Earth are those oafs up to?
Why don't we go upstairs and see, yes?
Do you know where your mother is?
No. I think she's in town.
Has she been spending much time at home?
Well, I'm pleased to see that you're wearing your...
You must always carry your DJ knife. Where is it?
And what are you doing in my house?
I did not know you had a sister, Johannes.
Sometimes he'd prefer if I was dead.
There is no need to attack his hideous physical deformity.
But, uh, why do you have his knife?
I'm guarding my room because he refuses to stay out of it.
Well, what do you have hidden in there?
You see, we deal with an inordinate number of reports, denunciations and general investigations.

And, of course, we are indeed interested in problems of crime and antiparty sentiment, but we still have one greater concern, that of the "Goldilockses." Sneaking around, eating other people's food, sleeping in their beds.
I don't suppose I could see your papers, could I?
How old are you in this photo?
Get a new photo. You look like a ghost in this one.
It'll be a gift to the FÃ¼hrer.
Guys, you have to see this.
There's one of them hanging upside down like a bat.
This one here, it is a drawing of their heads.
And who is operating the machinery of their brains?
Oh, look at this little, stupid Jew.
"Die, Nathan, die." "Ways of killing Nathan." Nathan being tortured by snakes.
Being fired from a cannon and just being called names.
Nathan being crushed under the wheel of an oldtime pennyfarthing bicycle.
Nathan being roasted over an open fire.
Reminds me, we must get back and...
You remember? Cause we left that guy hanging up.
You have really made my day.
I do hope you continue with it.
And, of course, if you see anything suspicious, give us a ring.
She was born on the seventh, not the first.
They'll figure out she's dead, then I'll be dead.
I'll tell Mama everything when she gets home.
That I know you and that we're friends.
Jew and Nazi are not friends.
Man, that was a complete bust.
She doesn't seem like a bad person.
I am beginning to question your loyalty to myself and the party.
The German soldier was born out of necessity.
Germany depends on the passion of these young men.
Passion and the readiness to fall for the Fatherland despite the futile efforts of Allied war profiteers who send their illprepared armies clumsily into the lair of the wolf.
And only zealous men who stand steadfast in the face of the enemy will be etched in German memory forever.
And it is up to you to decide if you want to be remembered, or disappear without a trace like a pitiful grain of sand into a desert of insignificance.
get your shit together and sort out your priorities.
only that she worked with her friends and your father was somehow involved from afar.
